touch ~/.oscrc cat > ~/.oscrc << FEOF [general] apiurl = http://117.78.1.88 [http://117.78.1.88] user = yaolonggang pass = pajk123@ FEOF
set -ex git config --global user.email "yaolonggang3@h-partners.com" git config --global user.name "yaolonggang"
osc co home:yaolonggang 0630

exit 0
